game.name: Martians VS Robots
game.description:
A horde of blood-thirsty souls have attacked on your planet and wiped out all the lives while leaving the dangerous ghosts or monsters behind. You are the brave souls who are the only ones left on your planet. Now you have taken the responsibility of cleaning up all the mess. Do you think that you are strong enough to reply to these deadly souls? Join Martians VS Robots and get ready to defend your city from the enemy units! Place your Christmas elves, withes and cannon by using your smart brain!
Initially, you will get confused what enemies you have to deal with. Are they robots, ghosts or evils? Grab your weapons and be prepared to defeat all the Martians who try to appear in front of you in this html5 space tower defense game! Your objective is to build defensive walls to defend your city against a number of dangerous enemy units. Do not forget to collect the raw materials to build cannons and buildings to eliminate the blood-thirsty monsters. 
Choose any out of the three modes including Classic, Christmas and Scary Halloween in this brand new war game! Make sure to apply the best approach to clear all challenging and additive levels. Your enemies can be robots or they can belong from the monster group. Be careful and try to place your weapon to defend against enemies reasonably in this cool strategy adventure challenge! Show your wisdom and intense fighting abilities to pass all levels! Good luck to try out more Halloween zombie games and have fun for long hours no download required!
